name: Fruit Master - Clazy Match
description:
Fruit Master is a casual game, simple and fun, one-handed operation!
Game description:
1. Start the game, follow the leisurely music rhythm, click the same fruit cube to collect it in the box
2. Three identical fruit cubes will be automatically eliminated in the frame, and each level has a specified time. The less time is consumed, the greater the chance of reaching full stars
3. Learn to use props flexibly, it will speed up your clearance
4. After eliminating the fruits in the level, the current level will be settled, and then you can challenge the next level

Game features:
1. Easy to use, easy to click, easy to eliminate
2. Creative levels, unlimited advancement, innovative experience
3. Picture introduction, music leisure, essential for stress reduction

Hurry up to eliminate them and become a master of cutting fruits!
